function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of systematic procedure for developing precautionary measures for COVID-19 in sports facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak in sports facilities","Mitigation":"Establishing a systematic procedure for implementing precautionary measures, such as regular disinfection, ventilation improvements, and distancing protocols","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, air purification systems, and contactless technology for facility access","People":"People using sports facilities, staff and management of sports facilities","Owner":"Local design practice, sports facility management, government health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of utilization of post-occupancy evaluation (POE) for proposed sports club designs","Impact":"Potential performance inefficiencies and safety hazards in the designed sports clubs","Mitigation":"Incorporating POE as a tool to assess facilities to improve their performance and address safety concerns after occupancy","Technologies":"POE assessment tools, data analytics for facility performance, and user feedback systems","People":"Architects, designers, developers, and stakeholders involved in sports facility design","Owner":"Architectural firms, sports facility developers, local municipality planning offices"},{"Description":"Neglect in implementing healthy and safety practices at sports facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of unintentional injuries and disease transmission within sports facilities","Mitigation":"Implementation of safety inspections, governance practices, and adherence to WHO targets for healthy cities","Technologies":"Safety inspection tools, health monitoring systems, and regulatory compliance software","People":"Users of sports facilities, staff and management of sports facilities, local communities","Owner":"Municipality offices, sports facility management, government health authorities"}]}
